categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Blue Eight was a Rebel Alliance fighter pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. Serving as a member of Blue Squadron, the Rebel stationed onboard the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Defiance until being killed in the months before the Battle of Endor. Blue Eight was honored at a funeral service along with fellow pilots Smithy, Roanda, Voxx and Waudok.
